title: The client problem
body: Every time after i turn off my PC or restart and run the client again i get a notification that settings have been changed for the best performance, thus 'close client during the game' box is checked and if i forget to uncheck it it takes 2000 years to open the client when i finish my game.

replies.body:
Oh wow, I can imagine that would be pretty frustrating for sure. There might be a setting within your config files that keep flagging that to happen, so let's try manually resetting those. Forewarning: this is going to reset most *all* of your settings, so be aware you may need to set those up again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
